scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=packages/shared" "npm run dev --workspace=apps/api" "npm run dev --workspace=apps/web"
scripts.build:web:vercel: npm install --workspace=packages/shared && npm run build --workspace=packages/shared && npm install --workspace=apps/web && npm run build --workspace=apps/web
scripts.build:render: npm run build --workspace=packages/shared && npx prisma generate --schema=apps/api/prisma/schema.prisma && npm run build --workspace=apps/api
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules apps/*/dist packages/*/dist
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run docker:up && npm run db:generate && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
